name: Stax!
description:
Stack boxes to reach as highest as possible. Play alone to beat your marks, or have fun in place with up to 7 more friends in a fun competitive/cooperative multiplayer mode!

Features:
- Endless single player mode... as long as you don't collapse the stack! ;)
- Crazy single player mode. Raise a stack as tall and fast as you can!!
- Play with up to 8 friends in quick multiplayer or elimination tournament games. Ideal for parties, gatherings, or just killing some time having fun!
- Touch-and-gravity controls for an innovative gameplay.
- Alter the balance in multiplayer games with perks and handicaps!
- Customizations applied optionally on determinate dates.
